page.title: 04BAKEWELL THE BAKERS
page.content: Bakewell is a small bakery with shop attached selling a variety of bread and cakes.There are obout 12 people who work there.Most of them are part_ time workers but Mr Murray and his son,who own the shop,and another man work full_time.These three make all the bread and cakes.They get flour in 32kg sacks from Clark's of Wantage and their sugar comes from Holland.The cheapest cake is a currant bun at 11p while wedding cakes cost from Â£10 to Â£20. Mr Murray makes Â£350 a day which has to pay rent,rates,wages and other overheads.The shop is regularly inspected for hygiene,weights and measures.The busiest time is from 3am to 9am when he is baking.The busiest time of year in the shop is at Christmas.
